fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > Use one of the abilities given to you at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> Every night, you will be given the abilities from 2 random Neutral (Evil) roles. These abilities must be able to have an impact in the game (for example you can't get Indecisive Executioner's or Horse Plinko Flexer's ability, since they won't impact the game).

> Choose 1 ability to use on your target(s).

fields.name: Win Con:
fields.value: > Have the good faction lose the game (you can win while dead).
